Docs.summary: Creates a panel that is associated with a .

remarks.format: ## Remarks The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitterPanel> is a member of its associated <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer> rather than being a member of the underlying form. At design time, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitterPanel> is accessible through the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.Panel1%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.Panel2%2A> properties of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer>.
